title: Stella McCartney
summary: Stella Nina McCartney OBE (born 13 September 1971) is an English fashion designer. She is a daughter of English singer-songwriter Sir Paul McCartney and the late Linda McCartney, an American photographer and animals rights activist. Like her parents, McCartney is a firm supporter of animal rights, environmentalism[1] and is particularly known for her use of vegetarian and animal-free alternatives in her work.
